authors: Patrick Reiser, Robin Ruff, Pascal Friederich (original code by Kristof Schütt)
algorithm_long: A continuous-filter convolutional neural network for modeling quantum interactions - SchNet. Implementation adapted to crystals in `kgcnn`. Original code from https://github.com/atomistic-machine-learning/schnetpack .
